name: Life of trophy
description:
( google translate )
This work explores the current achievement culture in a humorous way. Design a variety of game modes, including role-playing, horizontal scrolling, plane shooting, etc., use different game modes to distinguish the characteristics of each game platform, and can freely choose the order of play, each branch choice has its own ending, and some The ending can even make the second round have a different game experience, and during the game, experience various platform achievement systems, and then understand the unique charm of the achievement system.

Play mode: The main play mode is mouse selection and click, and when switching between different play modes, there will be multiple keyboards wsad (up, down, left, and right), space keys, etc., and there will be a Chinese and English explanation in the lower left corner of the game
